 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרַב‎</span> **verb** ==lie in wait== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be crafty***) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאָרַב‎</span> consecutive [[Deut.19.11|Deut 19:11]]; [[Judg.21.20|Judg 21:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרָֽבְתִּי׃‎</span> [[Job.31.9|Job 31:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָֽרְבוּ‎</span> [[Ps.59.4|Ps 59:4]]; [[Lam.4.19|Lam 4:19]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶאֱרֹב‎</span> [[Ps.10.9|Ps 10:9]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶאֱרֹ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Prov.1.18|Prov 1:18]]; [[Mic.7.2|Mic 7:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָיֶּ אֶרְבוּ‎</span> [[Judg.9.34|Judg 9:34]]; [[Judg.16.2|Judg 16:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶָֽאֶרְבָה‎</span> [[Prov.1.11|Prov 1:11]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱרֹב‎</span> [[Judg.9.32|Judg 9:32]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱרָבֿ‎</span> [[Prov.12.6|Prov 12:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹרֵב‎</span> [[Josh.8.2|Josh 8:2]] + 11 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺרֵב‎</span> [[Josh.8.12|Josh 8:12]] + 4 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹרְבִים‎</span> [[Josh.8.4|Josh 8:4]] + 2 t; — ***lie in wait*** (with hostile purpose), absolute [[Judg.9.32|Judg 9:32]]; [[Judg.9.43|Judg 9:43]] + [[Judg.21.20|Judg 21:20]]; [[Job.31.9|Job 31:9]]; [[Ps.10.9|Ps 10:9]]; [[Prov.7.12|Prov 7:12]]; [[Prov.23.28|Prov 23:28]]; [[1Sam.22.8|1Sam 22:8]]; [[1Sam.22.13|1Sam 22:13]]; [[Lam.3.10|Lam 3:10]] (of bear, compare [[Ps.10.9|Ps 10:9]]); with infinitive of purpose [[Ps.10.9|Ps 10:9]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Prov.12.6|Prov 12:6]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, and person against whom [[Deut.19.11|Deut 19:11]]; [[Judg.9.34|Judg 9:34]] usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Mic.7.2|Mic 7:2]]; [[Judg.16.2|Judg 16:2]]; [[Ps.59.4|Ps 59:4]]; [[Prov.1.11|Prov 1:11]]; [[Prov.1.18|Prov 1:18]]; [[Prov.24.15|Prov 24:15]]; [[Lam.4.19|Lam 4:19]] compare [[Josh.8.2|Josh 8:2]]; [[Josh.8.4|Josh 8:4]]; [[Josh.8.14|Josh 8:14]] ***Participle*** as substantive = ***liers-in-wait*** (plural) [[Judg.20.29|Judg 20:29]] usually singular collective ***ambush*** [[Josh.8.2|Josh 8:2]]; [[Josh.8.12|Josh 8:12]]; [[Josh.8.14|Josh 8:14]]; [[Josh.8.19|Josh 8:19]]; [[Josh.8.21|Josh 8:21]]; [[Judg.16.9|Judg 16:9]]; [[Judg.16.12|Judg 16:12]]; [[Judg.20.33|Judg 20:33]]; [[Judg.20.36|Judg 20:36]]; [[Judg.20.37|Judg 20:37]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.20.38|Judg 20:38]]; [[Ezra.8.31|Ezra 8:31]] plural of this singular = ambuscades [[Jer.51.12|Jer 51:12]] singular = ***place of lying-in-wait, ambush*** (local sense) [[Josh.8.7|Josh 8:7]]. **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** plural ***liers-in-wait*** ***id quod*** **Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאָֽרְבִים‎</span> [[Judg.9.25|Judg 9:25]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>), [[2Chr.20.22|2Chr 20:22]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>). ? **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַיָּרֶב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בנחל‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּאֲרֶב‎</span>) [[1Sam.15.5|1Sam 15:5]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 390</sup>; [[BDB#Ges|Ges-Kau]]<sup>§ 68. 2 queries</sup>) but text dubious; compare [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 237 b, &amp;</sup> [[BDB#Klo|Klo]], who proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויעבר בנחל‎</span>.
